node.text: You must be thirsty, traveler! How 'bout a pint of beer?

option.optiontext: There's a handsome man in Timberwell without a bride - interested?

node.text: I'm already taken, luv... 'sides I wouldn't abandon me tavern. Lots of single lassies to be found in Grainwater though, s'ppose could try asking one of them ones dancing in the corner. But how 'bout a pint of beer first?

node.text: Haven't you heard? Grainwater's the happiest town in Imberthale! We make good beer and we never run out, thanks to those wizards keeping the weather perfect and our crops growing. Speaking of beer, would you like a pint?

node.text: Now that you mention it, a lot of the folk around here do tend to concentrate on drinking... But that isn't to say I couldn't whip something together for you, something a bit special you won't be finding anywhere outside this village!
<color=#9C8C77>*You observe as Amelia puts together a kind of flatbread with delicious toppings. You feel confident you could replicate her steps by yourself.*</color>

Here you go, luv! It's a recipe's that's been done in this tavern for centuries, now how about some beer to accompany that?\n\n<color=#9C8C77>*You've unlocked the cooking recipe for Grainwater Flatbread!*</color>

node.text: Timberwell? Is it that dreary place in the woods? I don't think they even have a tavern!
Oh they got one, but it's a sad, dingy place! Nooo thank you very much! <color=#9C8C77>*giggles*</color>!
You could try asking our friend Ellen, she's outside catching some fresh air. Earlier she wouldn't stop going on about how desperate she is to get married.<color=#9C8C77>*Giggles*</color>!
